permissions: Admins can update prediction agents; non-admins can update if they have membership on the prediction subject.
side_effects: Updating custom instructions can enqueue analysis generation and may create or update an associated prediction.
validation_notes: Prediction agent ID argument is required. At least one updatable field must be provided (currently --custom-instructions). Updating custom instructions is rejected if a previous custom instruction request is already in progress.

flags.name: --custom-instructions
flags.description: Custom instructions to guide the agent
